org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb
Class AeXMLDBStorageProviderFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeAbstractStorageProviderFactory
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.AeXMLDBStorageProviderFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStorageProviderFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeExistStorageProviderFactory, AeTaminoStorageProviderFactory
public abstract class AeXMLDBStorageProviderFactory
extends AeAbstractStorageProviderFactory

A storage factory that creates XMLDB versions of the store objects.
